GET /accounts/{account_id}/alerting/v3/p.description: Get a list of all Notification policies.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters

alert_interval.description: Optional specification of how often to re-alert from the same incident, not support on all alert types.

alert_type.description: Refers to which event will trigger a Notification dispatch. You can use the endpoint to get available alert types which then will give you a list of possible values.

description.description: Optional description for the Notification policy.

enabled.description: Whether or not the Notification policy is enabled.

filters.description: Optional filters that allow you to be alerted only on a subset of events for that alert type based on some criteria. This is only available for select alert types. See alert type documentation for more details.

actions.description: Usage depends on specific alert type

alert_trigger_preferences.description: Usage depends on specific alert type

alert_trigger_preferences_value.description: Usage depends on specific alert type

event_type.description: Usage depends on specific alert type

group_by.description: Usage depends on specific alert type

pool_id.description: Usage depends on specific alert type

pop_name.description: Usage depends on specific alert type

query_tag.description: Usage depends on specific alert type

selectors.description: Usage depends on specific alert type

slo.description: Usage depends on specific alert type

tunnel_name.description: Usage depends on specific alert type

where.description: Usage depends on specific alert type

zones.description: Usage depends on specific alert type

id.description: The unique identifier of a notification policy

mechanisms.description: List of IDs that will be used when dispatching a notification. IDs for email type will be the email address.
